tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a consultation with Doctor last year related to my son's fever, cold and cough. I was highly impressed with her and yet again this year, I just wanted to choose her as my son's doctor. Even this time, she was professional, friendly who hears out her patient calmly and suggest the relevant and effective medication. Even she was quick enough to suggest alternative medicines through follow up messages. I guess she is the right fit even for future and I am happy to suggest others to choose her as well. I wish Doctor Sravanthi a bright future..
reply_text: Thanks for the review vipin..pleasure to her from u..take care

review: Consulted her for my daughter's hives. I had lots of queries for which I was not getting convincing answers from my city doctors. She is very polite and gentle . Understand the panic in parents . Explained thoroughly . Highly recommended. üôè
reply_text: Thanks for the feedback reetika..it was great talking to u too..take care

review: We have approached for Baby rash problem, got clear guidance & proper medication, also consulted regarding the upcoming Vaccinations. Appreciate her quick & clear responses and comforting words to make us less stressed during these times.Thank you Doc :-)
reply_text: Thank u so much for the feedback sunil..stay blessed

review: We consulted Dr Sravanthi for our 15 days old baby. Madam gave us the right advise and we very much appreciate her simple approach. Doctor clearly and instantly responded to every doubt we raised. She also checked baby photos and treated the baby. Highly satisfied with her treatment. Baby has become fine in just a day.
reply_text: Thank I for the feedback Balaji..it was my pleasure talking to u too..

review: I consulted her for my 4 yr old kid. she is really good at diagnosing and gives minimal medicines looking at kids' tantrums to take them. I am happy to consult with her for my kid.
reply_text: Thank u for the feedback sakshi..review back for any queries

review: it was nice conversation with her..she told every aspect of reason and reco  the best suitable medicine.
very patience listner **** ********* she is very humble she talk to my mrs. too as she is also impressed by the way she talk **** *******

She was very calm and made me relax ...she is a good listener...
Though she looked busy , she contacted me and listened about my baby...
Good response from mam..thanks
reply_text: Thank u for ur positive response

review: **** ****** * helped me with my new born child with jaundice ,baby recovered  and told me not to worry very good consultant

Explanation quality is high 
************* *********** 
Soft skill 
Overall experience excellent
I will recommend
